refnamediv.refpurpose: inittialise a persistent globally shared memory

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [sim] = ld_global_memory(sim, events, ident_str, datatype, len, initial_data, visibility, useMutex)

para.para: datatype - ORTD datatype of the memory (for now only ORTD.DATATYPE_FLOAT works)
initial_data - initial data of the memory
useMutex (integer) - 0 or 1. Use a mutex if you access the memory from different threads
